name: Ropata Molias
personality: Reserved but fiercely loyal to his comrades.
story: Ropata was born and raised in Saint Martin. He joined the French military as soon as he was eligible and has served in various conflict zones, including Afghanistan and Mali. On his last deployment, his team was ambushed and he was the sole survivor. He has carried the guilt of his team's deaths ever since and is determined to make up for it by being the best soldier he can be.
